thread.title: Entry-Level Financial Analyst at Accountemps (Minneapolis, MN)
thread.title_full: Entry-Level Financial Analyst at Accountemps (Minneapolis, MN)

title: Entry-Level Financial Analyst at Accountemps (Minneapolis, MN)
text: Classification: Account Executive/Staffing Manager Compensation: $13.00 to $16.00 per hour Do you have a sharp eye for detail and work well in a fast paced environment? An Entry Level Financial Analyst is needed for a well-known Financial Institution at their Minneapolis location. The temporary Entry Level Financial Analyst will be responsible for auditing, verifying documentation and analyzing information for government and conventional loans before purchase. Extensive training will be provided for this fast paced, entry-level, full-time position. Responsibilities for Entry Level Financial Analyst: - Working in a metrics driven environment to complete document reviews quickly and accurately - Ordering required documents for compliance of loan - Interpreting and analyzing policies and applicants To be considered for this position please submit your resume with a brief description of interest to eric.bergman@roberthalf.com
